oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE CONTROL OF WAVE ASYMMETRIES IN RANDOM WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Funke, E.R.
Mansard, E.P.D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave control
wave asymmetries
random waves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The concept of wave asymmetry is reviewed and a prototype wave record is analysed. A three stage non-linear transformation, together with a Fourier transform substitution technique, is described. The method is tested by numerical simulation using statistical analysis procedures. Physical realizations are compared graphically.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 18 (1982): Proceedings of 18th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Cape Town, South Africa, 1982.; 46
